note:
Deep in the heart of the woods, there once lived a tree that spent its years gathering stories from every creature of the forest. Over time it learned to craft a human body for itself, so that it may travel to distant lands to find tales it had never known. Some say it still lives in a secret grove, waiting to be discovered, and eager to share its collection with all who come to visit.

Its me. I'm the tree. Nice to meet you :)

note: I am a writer of magical realism , speculative fiction, middle grade SFF. and a lifelong storyteller. My stories, like my life, are permeated with the companionship of animals and nature and the palpable wisdom and guidance of All That Is. On the publishing path I am a debut author and currently querying MAGIC IN HER BONES. My angle of vision is not dystopian, I am putting my drop of blood in for a positive future. #AmQuerying #AmWriting #KidLit #SFF Singing, gardens, cats,dogs,horses

📚 Bookworm ✍️ Author 💻 Blogger
🖖 Trekkie 🐱 Cat lover 🌳 Tree-hugger
💙#t1dmum 🦸‍♀️ She/Her

note:
Robert Mason is an archaeologist at the University of Toronto & the Royal Ontario Museum. He does science on stuff, & has worked on castles & monasteries.

Robert Barry writes fantasy and science-fiction stories, he has published some of them on Amazon but plans to broaden his platform.

Robert Barry Mason has a garden with flowers, veggies, fairies, gnomes and a railway.
